item.title: Diwali Cleaning: blog post ideas dump
item.description: Diwali cleaning is a seasonal cleaning tradition in India (like Spring cleaning). I’m cleaning up my notes and dumping post ideas that I’m never going to get to.

item.title: Testing
item.description: Ditched Jekyll for Hugo. Found a 5/7 theme called Smol. Baby, I’ve got a stew going.
